content: Screw magazine extension tube SME ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for drill drivers and screwdrivers- - ### FEATURES:Features The SME magazine extension tube increases screw setting reach by 550 mm (21-1/2 inches) The SME magazine can be used with the Hilti SD 5000-A22, SD 5000-A22 02, SD 4500-A22, SD 5000, SD 4500, SD 6000, SD 2500 drywall screwdrivers and SMD 57, SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 screw magazines Applications Driving screws using the SMD 57, SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 screw magazines where an extended reach of 550 mm is required Driving screws using the SMD 50, SD-M 1 and SD-M 2 screw magazines where an extended reach of (21-1/2 inches) is required ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 21.7 in Weight: 1.9 lb. Technical Data | Length | 21.7 in | Weight | 1.9 lb ### ITEMS- 304495 - Screw magazine extension tube SME - Package Size 1 pc
